meanings.definition: A person who creates or maintains topiary.
meanings.sent1: The topiarists carefully shaped the bushes into animal shapes.
meanings.sent2: The topiarists in the park sculpted the hedges into beautiful designs.
meanings.sent3: The topiarists decided to have some fun and shaped the bushes into funny faces.
meanings.sent4: The topiarists' skillful hands turned ordinary shrubs into works of art.
meanings.sent5: The topiarists' dedication to their craft was evident in the intricate shapes they created.

meanings.sent1: The group of topiarists gathered to discuss their latest projects.
meanings.sent2: The topiarists were proud of their collective work in the garden.
meanings.sent3: The topiarists joked that they were like a forest of walking bushes.
meanings.sent4: The topiarists stood out in the garden like a colorful bouquet.
meanings.sent5: The topiarists' passion for shaping nature was contagious among their peers.
